Checkr | http://www.checkr.com | San Francisco | Full-stack Engineer, Back end Engineer, Product design lead

About Checkr: Checkr provides modern and compliant background checks for global enterprises and startups. Since graduating Y-Combinator in 2014, Checkrâ€™s product has shifted the on-demand economy. More than 3,000 businesses trust Checkr for their background screenings including Uber, Instacart, Handy, Zenefits, GrubHub, Caviar, and more. Checkr is featured on Forbes Next Billion-Dollar Companies of 2016. A career with Checkr provides the opportunity to make an impact on the professional lives of millions of people.

Get in touch at: https://checkr.com/careers/ or feel free to reach out to me personally: yan [.at.] checkr.com
